Header.title: The Best Soil in the World
Header.paragraph: Soils of the Palouse are deep, formed in an extensive deposit of loess and shaped by subsequent water erosion.

About.paragraph: The Palouse is the most serene and pastoral of the seven wonders of Washington State.

Services.name: Plant Soil
Services.text: Grow your plants in the Best Soil around.

Services.name: Expert Advise
Services.text: Ask our Master Gardeners all about growing year-around.

Services.name: Healthy Earth
Services.text: Sustainable business.  We work hard to maintain the earth we sell.

Services.name: Healthy Lifestyle
Services.text: Promoting a healthy lifestyle, eating what you grow.
